author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Club Car Showcases Complete Solutions for Hotels and Resorts at the Leisure Show in DubaiTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Club Car Showcases Complete Solutions for Hotels and Resorts at the Leisure Show in Dubai  
Club Car, the world’s largest small-wheel vehicle manufacturer for hotel, golf, commercial, business and personal use, and a brand of Ingersoll Rand, will demonstrate the latest transport and utility vehicle solutions for improved guest experience and staff productivity in hotel and resort industries, at the Hotel and Leisure show in Dubai, 28 – 30 September, 2015.
 
 
At the 1 B18 stand , visitors will learn about the largest small-wheel vehicle range in the market and how vehicles can be customized for every hotel or resort to provide solutions for applications ranging from guest transportation and housekeeping to security and waste collection.
 
 
“Club Car works closely with hotels and resorts worldwide to provide complete transportation solutions to manage their everyday challenges reliably and efficiently, and with increased productivity and guest satisfaction in mind,” said Tony Swinnerton, regional sales leader Middle East & Africa at Club Car. “Whether customers need maintenance or security transport, catering service, mobile merchandising, staff or guest transportation, Club Car can provide a tailor made solution that not only includes the largest selection of vehicles in the market but also software systems for management and control of the fleet.”
The Club Car showcase at the Hotel and Leisure show in Dubai will include:
 
Club Car Villager 4 – the most economical people mover designed with safety, comfort and durability in mind. Club Carryall 100 – an economical utility vehicle ideal for light work and general transportation. Club Carryall 500 – utility vehicle featuring an expanded bed and up to 1,500 pound total vehicle capacity. Guardian 2™ Control Centre – showing the capabilities of the Guardian 2 GPS control system that can help hotels and resorts manage and protect their assets: grounds, car fleet, visitors and staff.  
Club Car vehicles are available with gasoline engines as well as fully electric vehicles that generate minimal noise and no emissions allowing for safe use in indoor areas of hotels or resorts.
